Description:
Sophisticated class in a prime location
This near new luxury home presents a strong focus on style, scope and sophistication. Blending the latest in modern design with a free-flowing floorplan and a fresh white decor; the single storey layout presents open plan living at its finest. Towering ceilings with clear storey windows flood the main plan living area with light. The superbly appointed, designer kitchen hosting a partial butlers pantry, stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, glass splashback, two tone cabinetry, island breakfast bar and 900mm gas cooktop. A rumpus room at the rear of the property is ideal for a games room or retreat.
Glass sliding doors open to reveal a private courtyard with landscaped gardens intended for minimal maintenance and effortless entertaining. Boasting 4 double bedrooms; master suite features a huge walk in wardrobe and luxurious ensuite with double vanity and frameless shower, with the three secondary bedrooms all offering double robes, serviced by a centrally located bathroom and separate toilet.
Enhancing the property further is a remote double remote garage with internal entry, ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, laundry with cabinetry and downlights throughout. Turn the key into this near new low-maintenance lifestyle you've been looking for.
Insights: 12 Gene Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS WELCOMED
LIVE THE TIMBERTOP DREAM
First things first, the location of the Timbertop Estate is second to none, with strict design guidelines to adhere to in the estate you can be assured of a quality neighborhood for you and your family.
On entry into the estate you are greeted with tree lined streets and the popular locals hang out the Timbermill Café.
Hicks Reserve is the focal point that features large playground and you are walking distance to DAngelos winery. Not to mention just minutes from local shops, prestigious schools and public transport.
The home has been designed to encompass a high standard of living in a premium location. From the outset the home oozes class and sophistication with stylish façade and manicured gardens. As you enter to home, you will be amazed with the high ceilings and Jarrah hardwood flooring.
The master bedroom includes WIR and full ensuite, with additional bedrooms all including BIRs and serviced by the main bathroom. Defined by pristine presentation and spacious dimensions, you will be spoiled by choice with two separate living zones. The connoisseurs kitchen is fitted with stone benchtop, glass splashback, an abundance of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances.
Flowing out from the main living zone and ideal for entertaining family and friends, enjoy the under covered decked alfresco enhanced by surrounding landscaped gardens.
Added features of the home include remote controlled double garage, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, laundry, quality blinds, gas fireplace and much more.
Only on inspection can you truly appreciative the elegance that this home has to offer.

Description:
AVAILABLE MONDAY -SUNDAY FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION - BRILLIANT FIRST HOME OR DOWNSIZER - QUICK SETTLEMENT OPTION
Book your Private Inspection at a time that suits you. Please call to confirm your preferred day/time.
This near new home was completed in 2018 and blends a practical floor plan with modern features, making it ideal for a first home buyer or those downsizing that also want a low maintenance property.
The hub of this home is the kitchen/family area as it is designed to be enjoyed, whether feeding the family or relaxing on your own. The kitchen features a 90cm oven, matching cooktop and canopy style rangehood, dishwasher and a large breakfast bar for casual meals. This area leads directly into a pergola for easy indoor/outdoor living through all seasons.
Upgraded features include;
• Stone benches in the kitchen
• Laminate floors in high traffic areas
• LED downlights throughout
• Gas ducted heating
• Split system A/C x 2
If you want to be in your new home quickly, book your inspection time NOW and don't miss out!
IMPORTANT COVID-19 UPDATE
At Eview Group we have stringent plans in place to navigate through these changing conditions. We are currently continuing to operate with care, caution and a common-sense approach that balances selling with the need to protect personal safety for everyone.
Inspections - We request clients attending open homes and private inspections adhere to the following protocols;
• Do not shake hands at any time
• Stand a minimum of 1.5 metres apart
• Avoid touching all surfaces and fixtures
If you or anyone you have been in contact with has travelled overseas within the last 14 days, or has been diagnosed with COVID-19 or have been displaying flu like symptoms, we ask that you refrain from attending any open homes or private inspections.
Thank you for your co-operation.

Description:
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS WELCOMED
This home truly has been kept to an immaculate standard, with a striking façade and well tailored floor plan, this high-quality residence awaits you.
Downstairs features large main living area and open plan kitchen with stainless appliances, island benchtop, plenty of cupboard space and overlooks the meals area. Entertaining is made easy with sliding door access from the meals/kitchen area to the beautiful landscaped low maintenance backyard.
As you walk upstairs you will love the stunning light fixture the current vendors installed above the staircase. Upstairs you will find kids retreat/secondary living area with views looking out to the park. The master bedroom includes WIR and full ensuite. Bedrooms two, three and four are all serviced by the main bathroom which is finished with quality fixtures and fittings.
Added features include separate powder room downstairs, laundry, quality carpets, ducted heating, split system cooling, double garage, alarm system, double glazed windows and much more.
Located in the popular Potters Grove Estate, with the estate including it's own park with playground and the home is in close proximity to the Monash Freeway entrance, local schools/shops, Officers new proposed town centre and much more.

Build your Dream Home

Featuring generous dimensions of 16m x 30m, no easements and minimal fall, this block is titled plus ready to build on so you can be in your new dream home before you know it!

Description:
YOUNG FOUR BEDROOMS FAMILY HOME! PRIVATE INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENTS ONLY!!!
***PRIVATE INSPECTIONS ONLY***- Residing perfectly in the popular Prominence Estate this 2 years young and 21sqm (Approx) family home is perfect for families, first home buyers and investors. The floor plan consists of four bedrooms, one rumpus room, laundry and two bathrooms.
- Upon entry, you are welcomed by a master bedroom with a modern en-suite and spacious walk-in robe. The remaining three bedrooms comes with a built-in robe.
- Offering contemporary open plan living and stunning splashback kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances range hood, 900mm stove and oven, dishwasher, inbuilt microwave, ample cupboard space and stone island bench overlooking spacious family and meals area.
- Further complimented by a central bathroom with a separate toilet and large modern style laundry.
There is also a separate rumpus room heading towards a low maintenance concrete backyard.
Other inclusions are:
- Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling.
- Remote controlled double garage with internal access.
- 22 Solar panel system.
- 2.7m high ceiling height.
- Curtains, down-lights and tiles throughout and carpet in bedrooms.
- $10,000 FHOG applicable.
- The property comes with a builder's warranty.
All these and more, its located approx. 2.6km from Officer railway station and in a close proximity to Schools, Parks and Monash Freeway.
Please call in TODAY to book in a private inspection of the property.
Kashmira Prasad- 0405 364 434
Only Estate Agents Narre Warren

Description:
By Private Appointment Only
A grand facade and commanding street presence immediately draw you in to this magnificent family entertainer. Set back from the street behind perfectly manicured hedging allowing privacy and exclusivity. A substantial 51square floorplan offers an abundance of space on both levels, with expansive accommodation and living zones for the growing family. Downstairs is both formal and informal with open plan kitchen and family meals area, separate formal lounge space adjacent to the study. A generous downstairs master suite with well-appointed ensuite and walk in robe perfect for guests, older families and teenagers. The kitchen is superbly appointed and grand in proportions with an impressive walk in pantry, stone benchtops, high-end appliances and an abundance of cupboards and storage. The space provides a fantastic outlook over the pool area, backyard area and undercover entertaining haven. An inviting gas heated inground pool and garden area will be enjoyed year-round offering a great sense of privacy and enjoyment for the family in years to come. Upstairs living space includes a generous rumpus room with balcony, a perfect place to relax whilst enjoying the views and pool area. Second master suite is upstairs with a hotel-inspired ensuite including free standing bath, double vanity and a fully fitted dressing room. Comprehensive appointments include double remote garage with internal access and double gate side entry, alarm, ducted vacuum, ducted heating and two split systems. Location is second to none being walking distance to a number of public transport options, easy M1 & Princes Hwy access, proximity to Arena Shopping Centre and local schools both public and private.

Description:
CALL TO BOOK A PRIVATE INSPECTION WITH THE AGENT 2 Years young
Located in the heart of officer and close to all amenities, schools, shops and public transport is this lovely family home with all the finest touches, everything is done so just move in. The home is approx. 2 years young and not a cent has been spared from front to back.
As you walk up to the house, you will see the beautiful low maintenance landscaped gardens and a modern façade to make your home stand out from the rest. AS you walk in you are greeted by the master bedroom, with full ensuite and walk in robe, there is a formal lounge room to entertain those important guests in, which leads through to the open plan kitchen with walk in pantry, dishwasher and freestanding 900mm oven and gas cooktop. There is a separate family meals area as well which looks out to the alfresco and backyard.
Other features in this lovely home include, ducted heating and cooling, a remote double garage with internal access, plantation shutters, low maintenance backyard, and heaps more. This home will impress all buyers so call now.
inspections are by appointment only.

Description:
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS AVAILABLE
Encapsulating all that is desirable in a contemporary family residence, this impressive home situated in the heart of Officer's Arcadia estate, boasts an exceptional build by Dennis Family homes with a contemporary façade, complemented by luxurious appointments throughout. Whilst offering an interior which exudes style, the immaculate exterior leaves nothing to be desired.
Making a statement from the moment you arrive with a wide entrance hallway drawing you inside. Tailored for entertaining with multiple living areas; a grand open plan living and dining room and an additional generous sized living zone to the front of the home, ensuring all members of the family are catered for.
The kitchen is truly the heart of the home. The stunning modern kitchen equipped with the highest quality of fixtures and fittings such as 40mm stone benchtops, Smeg appliances including built in microwave, dishwasher, 900mm oven, cooktop and rangehood, ample bench space, overhead cupboards and a fabulous walk in pantry.
The grand master bedroom features a spacious walk in robe and private ensuite with double vanity and large shower. The additional three bedrooms feature built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
Promoting the perfect combination of indoor-outdoor living; with sliders leading outside to the covered alfresco overlooking the easy to maintain backyard with enough space for the kids to enjoy.
Offering impressive extras, such as ducted heating, double remote-control garage with internal and external access, laundry with additional storage, quality flooring and tiling throughout.
This home is sure to tick your boxes and wont last long! Call Angelia now to schedule a private inspections.

Description:
Fresh & Ready, Just MOVE IN!
This contemporary family home offers instant appeal with its modern façade, and its fantastic location. Situated in the Arcadia Estate in Officer which is highly desired for its affordability and family friendly environment.
Step inside this modern, freshly painted beauty and make your way to the heart of the home where the sun-drenched open plan kitchen awaits, complete with stainless steel appliances including 900m stovetop & oven, dishwasher, overhead cabinetry and breakfast bar adjoining to the spacious living and meals which adjoins one of the two covered outside pergola areas.
This well-designed home accommodates four generous sized bedrooms and two separate living zones. The master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite. The additional three bedrooms both have built in robes and are conveniently serviced by the functional main bathroom and separate toilet.
Additional extras include; ducted heating, split system cooling, separate laundry, double remote-control garage with internal and external access, additional side undercover concreted courtyard, low maintenance gardens to the front and back which is all positioned on a 400m2 approx. allotment.
If location is what matters to you, then look no further, set close to shops, public transport, easy freeway access, choice of schools and much more.
Whether you're an investor, first home buyer or just looking for a change then this home is sure to tick all the right boxes!

Description:
CONVENIENT 9.7 ACRE FARMLET
This ideally located farmlet which has all the convenience of being 6 minutes to Berwick yet seemingly miles away due to the pleasant rural outlook to the north while the shining lights of the metropolitan sprawl are to the south. A comfortable three bedroom brick home nicely positioned on the rise has a large lounge room, meals area adjacent to the kitchen, a functional bathroom and laundry facilities all in good order. There are plenty of sheds and storage including a double steel garage, 18m x 10m (app) fully enclosed shed with 3 phase power, 18m x 10m (app) open fronted storage/machinery shed and the old piggery building. Mains water and three large paddocks for the animals if required. Quality schools are very close, a lovely lifestyle awaits the new owners.

Description:
Family Living in a Convenient Location
Whether it's great location or stylish family living you desire, you can be sure 39 Curran Drive Officer offers it all.
This spacious home offers 4 generous sized bedrooms, master with full ensuite and huge walk in robe. The remaining bedrooms are all complete with double built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet.
There is plenty of room for everyone in either of the two living areas adjoining the kitchen which is centrally positioned between the two. This kitchen comes complete with plenty of bench space and cupboards, dishwasher and gas cooktop. The theatre room/rumpus room/kids retreat can be closed off when separation is needed.
The perfect location of this home means you can leave the car at home and stroll across the road to Arena Shopping Centre, medical centre, childcare centre and more. As equally convenient is the short walk to St Francis Xavier College and St Clare's Primary School.
Other features of this property include downlights throughout, evaporative cooling, split system cooling, ducted heating, double lock up garage.
Do not miss out on your chance to secure 39 Curran Drive, Officer - call Amber Gehling today on 0402 401 532 to arrange your inspection.

Description:
State of the art, built to exacting standards.
Wonder in amazement as you gaze upon this beautiful property, located on the north side of the highway in the forever popular Timbertop estate.
7 star energy rating, and designed to be carbon neutral, this 6 bedroom more than stylish family home, is full of features and fixtures designed to make your existence easier.
Solar panels to the roof will save on that ever increasing power bill, highly insulated walls and ceiling cavity also saves on power consumption, with magnificent flooring of quality carpets, tiles and floorboards, well-appointed kitchen with excellent stainless steel appliances and stone benches, convection cooking, and numerous split system heating and cooling units throughout, enable your perfect indoor climate.
Master with WIR, and guest's bedroom with BIR, both have ensuites, whilst the other four bedrooms all with WIRs are serviced easily by a stylish main bathroom.
Space is yours to entertain in, with family, separate meals, theatre downstairs and another sitting area upstairs. Alfresco flowing from the meals completes an extraordinary picture.
Minutes from Haileybury and all leading schools, shops , train and buses, hospitals and specialists and at the entrance of the M1.
This property has it all.

Description:
$550,000 - $600,000 ; PRIVATE INSPECTION AVAILABLE
MODERN DESIGN, YOUNG & STYLISH
Designed immaculately, with a brilliant feel of spaces and quality in mind, this beautiful 23sqm aprox. boutique built home that's only 3 years young has an abundance of light as your welcomed into the home. Upon entry your gravitated to the master bedroom complete with a stylish stone double vanity & large shower and ample space in the walk-in robe. The remaining bedrooms are all equipped with built in robes.
Offering you a well-appointed open plan kitchen with quality appliances including stainless steel rangehood, dishwasher and 900mm stove top & oven, in built microwave, ample cupboard storage and stone bench space overlooking the functional dining area and living zone as well as a second living zone and powderoom.
The gardens to the front and back of the home are low in maintenance so you won't find yourself spending your days off in the garden though has plenty of room for the kids and pets to enjoy.
Other features of this wonderful home include ducted heating, split system cooling, large laundry with ample storage and quality fixtures and fittings throughout, a double remote car garage and space for additional storage!
Located in the highly sought after Grandvue Estate in Officer and positioned across from the tranquil parkland, this is a rare opportunity to secure an excellent home with so much on offer. You will be close to all amenities such as schools, shops, transport and parks.
If you would like to inspect the home please don't hesitate to contact us today.

Please check our guidelines before attending open for inspections, auctions or our offices.

Description:
Prized parkside position
Neatly nestled on a corner block, this stylish 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home features an affordable entry point into a sought-after, peaceful parkside pocket.
Discover a stainless-steel kitchen with an inviting island bench and dishwasher, underpinned by light, bright and air-conditioned open-plan living and dining.
Enjoy a luxurious bathroom with a bath and walk-in shower, a low-maintenance, landscaped garden, and a remote-controlled 2-car garage with internal access.
* 3 large bedrooms, main with walk-in robes and stunning ensuite, 2 with mirrored BIR
* Separate WC and laundry
* Ducted heating plus split-system heating and cooling
* Recessed down-lighting
* Roller blinds
* Close to Club Officer entertainment and easy city-bound freeway access
Metres away from the greenery of Gin Park, take advantage of Cardinia Road trains, a range of quality schools, and Lakeside shopping. This is the life!
For more information, please contact Eric Lim today.

Description:
Start A Winning Life At Winland
With only 45 mins from Melbourne CBD, enjoy easy access to Metro train station and Monash Freeway, surrounded by wide range of quality schools, close to local amenities, Officer become one of the most sought-after suburbs in South East Growth Corridor for first home buyers and investors.
Peake Real Estate Proudly present Winland Estate one of the finest in Officer:
Only minutes from Officer Precinct
Easy access to Beaconsfield Station and Officer Station
3 minutes to get on Monash Freeway
Timbertop Café at your door step
Adjoining to proposed government school and sports reserve
Block range from 250m2-519m2 approx.
Majority 12.5m and 14 m frontage
Stage 1 expected to title late 2020
On offer is a 381m2 (approx..) allotment, with 14 metre frontage - fits most of modern floor plans from major builders, bus stop and freeway just at door step, take advantage of small deposit and long settlement. Perfectly facing the proposed Government School, Whether you are first home buyers or investors and downsizer, you are always a winner at Winland Estate. Start your winning life by contact Brix Cai today on 0433 925 529 for an inspection and more information.

Description:
Light-filled Luxury in The Heart of Officer!
Bright and sunny in one of the best locations in Officer, this immaculately presented 3-bedroom home is a modern Officer delight!
Sitting just moments away from Officer and Beaconsfield, this is a perfect freestanding home for young families, downsizers or investors alike.
Stepping through the charming entry is a study area, follow the stylish tiled flooring through to the open plan kitchen/meals/lounge areas. The spacious and well-appointed kitchen has ample cabinetry, modern appliances, walk in panty and bench space.
Additional features of this generous layout include evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, double remote garage with internal access
There are built-in wardrobes to two bedrooms which are serviced by a central bathroom. The master bedroom has walk in robe and a chic ensuite with an oversized shower.
This secure 338m2 block has enough room for pets/children.
Close to shops, schools, parks and transport. Do not delay call to book a private inspection or attend one of our regular open for inspections.
Real Estate Officer, Barry & Christine Eview Group, Officer Real Estate, Real Estate Agents Officer.

Description:
CALL, EMAIL OR TEXT AGENT TO ARRANGE INSPECTION!
SUPERIOR MODERN HOME - GATED REAR ACCESS!
Coming home to 2 Hester Street, Officer will never be something you dont enjoy! As soon as you arrive youll forever be greeted by beautiful established gardens that are perfectly complimented by the one of a kind letterbox!
Situated on an extremely user friendly 584m2 corner block complete with the security of gated side access to the rear for the boat, caravan or trailer. Its not often you can have this level of modern home, this close to amenity and still have vehicle access to the rear!
Inside the home the story just keeps improving! Entering via the front door youll be greeted by a widened entrance and immediately notice the beautiful flow of the home as you step onto the floating timber floors. To the right is a HUGE master bedroom complete with a generous walk in robe and a private ensuite featuring an oversized shower and stylish tiling.
Moving further down the entrance hall, again, to the right is a great sized bedroom 4 that could also be used for a multitude of purposes as it has glass sliding doors to the rear yard. Adjacent to this room is the internal access door to the double remote garage. Continuing on is the first of the living zones with this one being perfectly positioned and really sets the tone of the home as an open formal lounge. Next, is the kitchen! This is the kitchen we all want but so rarely find, featuring beautiful neutral caeserstone counter tops, 900mm freestanding gas cooker, dishwasher and a massive walk in pantry and overlooks the family room, dining room and is absolutely loaded with beautiful natural light! Moving along to the next wing of the home youll find another 2 oversized bedrooms that are serviced by the stylish family bathroom and seperate toilet. This zone is further complimented by a third living room creating the perfect family retreat wing perfect for kids, guests or parents to move in! Some of the extra features also fitted is gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and solar panels to offset the power bill!
As stated earlier its not often youll find all of this in a property with such a modern vibe and still have the convenience of being perfectly located close to a selection of schools, public transport, shopping options and so much more! Bring your inspection checklist along and youll certainly tick all the boxes here! DONT WAIT! CALL TODAY
Internal area
232.25m²
